answers.answer: What do you want to know?  Do you have a frozen shoulder?  Technically known as adhesive capsulitis.   It can occur in many situations- post-op, post-injury, diabetes.Here is a link for some more information....http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmedhealth/PMH0001490
